verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: claims] [ARG1: that since he was n't under oath he can lie to the press about anything] .
Donald Trump claims that since [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG2: under oath] he can lie to the press about anything .
Donald Trump claims that since he was n't under oath he [V: can] lie to the press about anything .
Donald Trump claims that [ARGM-CAU: since he was n't under oath] [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: lie] [ARG2: to the press] [ARG1: about anything] .
